DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine effect two different dose level estrogen placebo healthy postmenopausal woman measure change hormone level examine change uterine lining ( endometrium ) .
DOC.brief_title: A Clinical Study Evaluate Effects Estrogen Healthy Postmenopausal Women
DOC.criteria: Patient healthy postmenopausal woman less equal 65 year age onset menopause less equal 10 year prior prestudy visit 1 Patient uterus history uterine bleeding past 3 month Patient previous endometrial biopsy within last 4 week Patient normal mammogram within last 11 month Patient normal papsmear within past 3 year prior screen Patient normal transvaginal ultrasound endometrium Patient willing avoid strenuous physical activity strenuous unaccustomed weight lifting , run , bicycling , etc duration study Patient agree consume grapefruit product begin approximately 2 week prior first dose study drug throughout study Patient agree limit daily consumption alcohol . During study , daily alcohol consumption 2 glass Patient agrees limit daily consumption caffeine . During study , daily caffeine consumption exceed 3 cup coffee Patient nonsmoker Patient mentally legally incapacitated Patient history first degree relative breast endometrial cancer Patient history multiple and/or severe allergy prescription nonprescription drug food Patient use type estrogen progesterone preparation unless follow appropriate washout period Patient surgery , donate approximately 500 mL blood participate another investigational study within last 4 week Patient history deep vein thromboses , coronary artery disease , heart attack stroke Patient current user illegal drug Patient history hypersensitivity estrogen product Patient unable refrain use anticoagulant
